title: Memory Assessment

elements.name: intro_text
elements.title:
Welcome to the Memory Assessment

This assessment focuses specifically on memory skills, including both short-term and long-term recall. Please answer each question thoughtfully.

elements.name: question_self_perceived_memory_strength
elements.title: How would you rate your memory ability overall?

elements.name: question_reliance_on_memory_aids
elements.title: How often do you use tools or strategies to remember important information?

elements.name: question_memory_challenges
elements.title: Which aspect of memory do you find most challenging?

elements.name: question_memory_technique
elements.title: When you need to remember something, what do you typically do?

elements.name: question_self_reflection_post_assessment
elements.title: After completing these tasks, how would you now rate your memory ability overall?

elements.name: question_open_ended_feedback
elements.title: Did you find any part of the memory assessment particularly fun or challenging? Please share your thoughts.

elements.name: question_assessment_difficulty
elements.title: How would you rate the overall difficulty of this assessment?

elements.name: question_future_participation
elements.title: Would you be interested in participating in more memory-related assessments in the future?

completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Memory Assessment!
